work-item.field:
Here is an example of a job for xml import and test run creation which can be used for testing:

  <job cronExpression="0 0/10 18-06 * * ?" id="xUnitFileImport" name="Import Tests Results" scope="system">
    <path>C:\D\xUnit</path>
    <project>My_Project</project>
    <idPrefix>UT-</idPrefix>
    <userAccountVaultKey>xUnitFileImportUser</userAccountVaultKey>
    <maxCreatedDefects>10</maxCreatedDefects>
    <maxCreatedDefectsPercent>5</maxCreatedDefectsPercent>
    <templateTestRunId>xUnit Test Manual Upload</templateTestRunId>
    <templateTestCaseId>WI-140</templateTestCaseId>
    <idRegex>(.*).xml</idRegex>
    <groupIdRegex>[^-]*-(.*).xml</groupIdRegex>
    <typeRegex>([^-]*)-.*.xml</typeRegex>
  </job>
